content: {"name": "DC Office of Aging: Hayes SWC- Community Dining", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Hayes SWC is a DC activity center with social, recreational, and educational programs for adults ages 60+. They also offer  community dining for those who become members.\nProspective members must submit the Intake Form and bring the completed Physical Release Form to the center to begin the orientation process. You can find both forms here: https://www.hayesswc.com/join-us or you can go by the office to pick them up.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.hayesswc.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "500 K Street Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Northeast Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20002", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9028645, "longitude": -76.9993168}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 724-5626", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Must be a resident of Washington DC"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}]}
